snippet.title: Planet Crafter - Official Steam Trailer | 2021
snippet.description:
"Planet Crafter" new exclusive Steam trailer.

Wishlist now : https://steam.pm/app/1284190/

Panet Crafter is a space survival open world terraforming crafting game. Transform the ecosystem of a hostile planet to make it livable for humans. Survive, collect, build your base then create oxygen, heat and pressure to make a brand new biosphere.
